name: Bubble Nova
description:
Get ready for an action-packed game! Try out the classic and super fun Bubble Nova shooting game, journey across space and explore thousands of cosmic levels filled with awesome puzzles and challenges.

Match at least 3 bubbles of the same color to pop balloons, overcome the obstacles and unlock special boosts and power-ups on your way to a popping victory.

It is time for a galactic battle! Hit and pop all the balls and win levels in this awesome bubble shooter space game. Download now and explore plenty of exciting levels, challenges, and puzzles that will keep you entertained for hours! Play this free game with no wifi and no internet needed! Enjoy the popping fun and start blasting balloons before your spaceship gets invaded!

Bubble Nova Game features:
- Pop balls to complete thousands of amazing cosmic levels in space.
- Easy and fun to play.
- Completely addicting game!
- Awesome galactic graphics and effects, tons of colorful bubbles.
- Completely FREE to play.
- Play online or offline!

Have some time to spare? Want to relax and clear your mind? Play the new bubbles game, and immerse yourself in excitement!


How to Play Bubble Nova shooting game?
- Tap on the screen to drag the laser aim and lift it to hit bubbles.
- Match 3 or more bubbles to pop combos and win points.
- Pop all bubbles to win this challenging game.
- Get extra score when bubbles fall into the black holes of the galaxy.
- Reach high scores so you can earn 3 stars on every level.
- Explore thousands of galactic levels, beat the challenges and clear the board.
- Drop 10 bubbles or more to get a bomb that will take out surrounding bubbles.
- Pop 7 bubbles in a row to unlock a fireball that will clear a path.


Feeling competitive? Share Nova Bubbles with friends and race for the highest score! Shooting bubbles was never this fun!


Enjoy the fun puzzle action game now, with no internet and no wifi needed!
